Package businesslayer

Class RecipientsBusinessLogic

java.lang.Object
businesslayer.RecipientsBusinessLogic
public class RecipientsBusinessLogic extends Object
Will be called by the demo class, using the ReceiptsDAO in obtaining column and row data from the database, while also validating the information pass Validating: Making sure no Null or unwanted output
